response.overview: A young guy, convinced that money is the main thing in life, agrees to an adventure, while violating the law and conscience. A well-known doctor, a terminally ill patient begs to give her a lethal injection, offering everything she has in return. But constant quarrels with his son, who reproaches him for poverty, make him seriously think about the patient's proposal… An old man, a resident of a distant village, has been working as a gravedigger all his life. He loves his job and feels some sense of life in it, although his family broke up a long time ago because of it, and he still does not know about their future fate... Each of the Characters will make their own choice, and fate will put everything in its place. After all, the main thing is to find your path! The path to the clouds…
response.title: The Path to the Clouds
